name: Coast Defender
description:
Engage in fierce confrontations across air, sea, and land. Each skirmish stands as a testament to your tactical prowess. Do you have what it takes to ascend the ranks and be hailed as a legendary defender in this ceaseless war?



Fluid Gameplay Mechanics
Command the battlefield with intuitive controls. Obliterate enemy air forces, decimate naval fleets, and reign supreme in intense tank duels. Master each level, reap your rewards, and sharpen your abilities for even greater challenges ahead.

Ever-Changing Battlefronts
Every chapter thrusts you into a unique warzone. From storm-lashed seas to wind-swept deserts, the theatre of warfare constantly evolves. Conquer each terrain and progress through a captivating saga of defense.



Evolve and Enhance
Accumulate accolades and strategically bolster your strengths. Prioritize health for resilience, elevate damage to amplify firepower, boost agility with speed, or refine your shooting accuracy. Consider equipping an additional gun to further enhance your offensive prowess.

Radar Precision
Harness the power of advanced radar technology. Track enemy maneuvers, devise potent strategies, and execute flawless strikes. Perfect your aim to vanquish foes with singular, lethal shots.



A Spectrum of War Machines
Square off against a diverse array of enemy units. From nimble military helicopters to formidable twin-fuselage aircraft and state-of-the-art naval vessels, each confrontation offers the raw adrenaline of authentic combat.
